general_perception.description and explanation:
In the current traffic image, there is a large truck ahead in the left lane traveling in the same direction as our car. Its cargo area is loaded with construction machinery. Due to the size of the truck and the nature of its cargo, it is necessary to increase the following distance to ensure sufficient time to stop and to avoid any potential debris that may fall from the truck.

Additionally, on the left side of the road, there is a blank billboard. Although this billboard does not directly influence driving behavior at present, it could provide key road or traffic updates in the future if it begins displaying information.

driving_suggestion: Maintain a safe distance from heavy trucks ahead, be mindful of potential stability changes due to shifting loads, and be prepared to respond to any irregular movements. When lane markings are clear and no imminent danger is detected, continue driving in the current lane. Pay attention to blank billboards to prevent missing updated traffic information while driving.
